body.p:
HCON 14 RDS
113th CONGRESS
1st Session
H. CON. RES. 14
IN THE SENATE OF.Con.Res.14

center.p:
AT THE UNITED STATES
March 7, 2013
Received
CONCURRENT RESOLUTION
Permitting the use of the rotunda of the Capitol for a ceremony as part of the commemoration of the days of remembrance of victims of the Holocaust.FIRST SESSION

inserted.p: Begun and held at the City of Washington on Thursday,
the third day of January, two thousand and thirteen

p.em: Resolved by the House of Representatives (the Senate concurring),

body.h3: SECTION 1. USE OF ROTUNDA FOR HOLOCAUST DAYS OF REMEMBRANCE CEREMONY.

ul.p: The rotunda of the Capitol is authorized to be used on April 11, 2013, for a ceremony as part of the commemoration of the days of remembrance of victims of the Holocaust. Physical preparations for the ceremony shall be carried out in accordance with such conditions as the Architect of the Capitol may prescribe.

body.p:
Clerk of the House of Representatives March 6, 2013.
Attest:
KAREN L. HAAS,Clerk.
